Name: Glazemeat Sauce Lv.2
Description2$english: Using the fattier parts of high-quality meat, it is specially prepared to present a semi-transparent glazed texture.

recipes.Name: Crystalline Blossom Honey-Glazed Meat Relish
recipes.Des:
Crafting yields products Lv.1, Lv.2, and Lv.3 at rates of 50%, 40%, and 10%, respectively.
Made from the fattier cuts of prime meat, this glossy relish is prepared using a special technique to give it a gem-like, translucent sheen. A visual and flavorful indulgence.
recipes.Des$english:
Crafting yields products Lv.1, Lv.2, and Lv.3 at rates of 50%, 40%, and 10%, respectively.
Made from the fattier cuts of prime meat, this glossy relish is prepared using a special technique to give it a gem-like, translucent sheen. A visual and flavorful indulgence.

NeedMaterial.Name: Exquisite Raw Meat
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Top-tier processed fresh meat, not only retaining the ultimate flavor but also achieving a perfect balance of fat and lean through exquisite Artisanship, requiring only a skilled cook to transform it into a feast for gourmets.

recipes.Name: Exquisite Raw Meat
recipes.Des:
Can process beast meat into Exquisite Raw Meat that can be used as a top-grade ingredient.
This process yields 6-7 products.
recipes.Des$english:
Can process beast meat into Exquisite Raw Meat that can be used as a top-grade ingredient.
This process yields 6-7 products.

NeedMaterial.Name: Raw Shiny Meat
NeedMaterial.Description: After processing​, it can be used for delicious cooking.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: After processing​, it can be used for delicious cooking.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Meat obtained from wild creatures, the final taste depends entirely on the adventurer's cooking skills.

NeedMaterial.Name: Azure Fruit
NeedMaterial.Description: Used for cooking, making delicious dishes.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Used for cooking, making delicious dishes.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Emerging from the ocean floor, this rare blue fruit is the seabed's most treasured offering.

NeedMaterial.Name: Limpid Azure Water
NeedMaterial.Description: Naturally harvested, it can be used in cooking or further processed for a variety of versatile applications.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Naturally harvested, it can be used in cooking or further processed for a variety of versatile applications.

NeedMaterial.Name: Honey
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A rare sweet seasoning, popular in Asterleeds dessert store.
